comment.text: The "ApplicationsDeletedSuccessfully" translation key is used to display a success message when applications are deleted successfully in an OAuth settings context. This message appears as part of a delete dialog and a toast notification when the delete process completes without errors.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "Հավելվածը հաջողությամբ միացված է" translates to "The application was successfully connected." This does not accurately reflect the English phrase "Applications deleted successfully." The Armenian translation should convey the meaning of deletion, not connection.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Հավելվածները հաջողությամբ ջնջվեցին։ (Havelappner hacoghutyamb dzngev cin).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '애플리케이션이 삭제되었습니다' is a literal translation of 'Applications were deleted'.  The original English indicates success. A better translation would convey that the action was successful.

While the Lao translation conveys the general meaning, a more natural and accurate translation for 'Applications deleted successfully' would be something along the lines of 'ຄໍາຮ້ອງຖືກລຶບອອກຢ່າງຖືກຕ້ອງ' or 'ຄໍາຮ້ອງຖືກລຶບອອກແລ້ວທຸກຄັ້ງ'. The current translation 'ຄໍາ ຮ້ອງ ຖືກ ລົບ ອອກ ຢ່າງ ສົມບູນ ແລ້ວ' sounds slightly awkward and uses 'ສົມບູນ' (complete) which isn't the most fitting adjective in this context. 'ຖືກຕ້ອງ' (correct) or simply stating it has been deleted (ຖືກລຶບອອກແລ້ວທຸກຄັ້ງ) is preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄໍາຮ້ອງຖືກລຶບອອກຢ່າງຖືກຕ້ອງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Aplicații au fost șterse cu succes' uses the passive voice. While grammatically correct, it sounds less natural than an active construction in this context. Considering the message conveys a successful action performed by the system, a more direct phrasing might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aplicațiile au fost șterse cu succes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'යෙදුම්' (yedum) is the correct spelling for 'applications'.
The sentence structure could be improved for better flow and clarity. While technically correct, it sounds slightly unnatural. Consider a more common phrasing.

While 'මකන ලදි' (makana ladi) translates to 'deleted', 'ඉවත් කරන ලදි' (iwath karan ladi) or 'හරවා ලදි' (harawa ladi) are more commonly used and natural-sounding when referring to deleting applications in Sinhala. 'මකන' has a more forceful connotation.
The translation "Aplikacije uspešno izbrisane" is grammatically correct but sounds awkward and passive. A more natural and active phrasing would be better.

The translation 'Застосунки успішно видалено' uses the diminutive form 'Застосунки' which might be too informal for a formal context like OAuth application management. 'Застосунки' is more suitable for children's applications or informal settings.

The translation '多个应用已删除' (Duō gè yìngyòng yǐ shānchú) translates to 'Multiple applications have been deleted'. While not entirely wrong, it doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of 'Applications deleted successfully'. The emphasis on 'successfully' is lost.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 考虑更贴切的翻译，例如：应用删除成功 (Yìngyòng shānchú chénggōng) - 'Applications deleted successfully' or 删除应用成功 (Shānchú yìngyòng chénggōng) - 'Successfully deleted applications'.
